sentences.sContent: Why don’t you stop ranting and raving for a minute and listen?
sentences.sCn: 你别大喊大叫的，稍停一会儿，仔细听好吗？

words.tran: 大叫大嚷的人；发豪言壮语的人

remMethod.val: 别惹蚂蚁 (ant) ， 愤怒的蚂蚁会怒气冲冲地叫嚷 (rant)

trans.tranOther: to talk or complain in a loud excited and rather confused way because you feel strongly about something
